body.name: FOLUBAN Rustic Coffee Table,Wood and Metal Industrial Cocktail Table for Living Room, 47 Inch Oak
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 58 mins
features: MINIMALIST DESIGN: Stripping away of all unnecessary elements and focusing on what needs to be there, the minimalistic coffee table can be summed up: it's simple, it's tasteful, and it creates the clean and clutter-free space that’s perfect for relaxing.

RUSTIC INDUSTRIAL STYLE: Clean design meets rustic industrial style in this charismatic coffee table. Tastefully distressed for a reclaimed aesthetic, this coffee table is crafted of MDF with wood grain, while a clean-lined steel frame in a powder-coated matte black finish offers a sophisticated contrast.

SUPER EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This coffee table is designed to ensure that anybody can put it together with ease. Following our clear Assembly Instruction, it only takes 5 minutes to assemble this simple coffee table. All hardware and assembly instruction are provided.
STURDY and DURABLE: 2 inch thickness table top and thick metal tube make this rustic cocktail table super sturdy, and the weight capacity of this coffee table is more than 300 LBS.
WORRY-FREE WARRANTY: We promise 30 Days Money-Back Guarantee, Worry-Free-12 Month Quality Warranty and Friendly Customer Service.
body.description: Charming Industrial Character As an essential piece for every sensible home, this Coffee Table stands out with its charming industrial character and functional strength. Its clean silhouette sketches the exceptional taste of the host and its neutral property can merge with a wide range of interior arrangement. Protect your Wood Floor from Scratching We provide 4 self-adhesive rectangle furniture pads for the steel table legs to make sure your cocktail table doesn't scratch your floors. Minimalist Design This coffee table is in minimalist style and industrial design, which makes it suitable for many scenes, like living room, office leisure area. Perfect for you to enjoy leisure time. SPECIFICATIONS: Material: MDF, Metal and Wood Grain Color: Oak Product Size: 47.2''W x 23.6''D x 18''H Product Weight: 29.18 LBS Load Capacity: 300 LBS Package Contents: 1 x Coffee Table, 1 x Assembly Instruction, 1 x Hardware

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! So pleased!
reviews.reviewText: This coffee table is better than I imagined it would be! It’s very sturdy and looks so much more expensive in person. The color wood is perfect for my space. No chips or scratches and so easy to assemble. I would buy from this company again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rustic feel, Very sturdy but light, delivered in perfect condition, great product at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: It was delivered sooner than expected, in perfect condition, both a pleasant surprise! I unpackaged then had it assembled in 5 minutes. Super Easy! Another nice surprise was to find the sellers personal email embedded in the instructions! All tools were included and instructions were clearly written! really I had the whole thing done in 5 minutes, literally just a set of screws to hold the legs onto the top. Became a little Dusty so I wiped it down with the dampened paper towel before beginning to assemble. It is definitely a rustic finish which surprised me a bit. I didn't realize I was hoping for something more smooth but will likely order a tempered glass top from the local glass shop or put a coat or 2 of polyruethane to protect the finish from spills. I love it! It's the perfect large but not overwhelming size - exactly what I needed in front of my couch. It's 2 inches shorter than my couch. Has very clean lines which makes me want to leave it cleaned off off- and less clutter is good! that's a good thing. Sometimes I just want to get off the couch and sit on the floor and use it kind of like a little desk while you're watching TV, go through some mail, things like that. I'm glad I didn't get a table with a second lower bottom shelf. Also I hope kids visit, sit on the rug, play games or work on projects- it's a great place for "little" ones to congregate while adults remain closeby. Love the color, it's sturdy, Never wobbles, with squared but not super sharp edges. Has a modern minimalist look. Color is true. I could have purchased something a little more formal or for storage butI am trying to minimize stuff owned This is perfect for now. Its lightweight but the legs secure it firmly in placed. I definitely see my college age kids wanting it someday and I am sure it will last a long time ( not press board). Crafted well and if you looking for a rustic, basic, budget friendly, sturdy, and minimalist coffee table with high potential for multifunctionality, you too will be happy with this. I really like it because it's super simple yet sturdy. Height is absolutely perfect I can extend my legs and rest my heels if I want to. But don't let anybody know my feet are on the table under that blanket! I know it will have a brightened look In Summer with a vase of yellow and white flowers! I'm happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This coffee table is perfect for our space. It was incredibly simple to set-up and only took a few minutes. If you're looking for a budget friendly option that still looks great, look no further!

Impressed by the quality—it's not too heavy, making it easy to move around. The perfect size, and I'm genuinely happy with this purchase.
